BITAttributedLabelDelegate Protocol Reference

Conforms to NSObject
Declared in BITAttributedLabel.h

Overview

The TTTAttributedLabelDelegate protocol defines the messages sent to an attributed label delegate when links are tapped. All of the methods of this protocol are optional.

Tasks

  • – attributedLabel:didSelectLinkWithURL:

    Tells the delegate that the user did select a link to a URL.
  • – attributedLabel:didSelectLinkWithAddress:

    Tells the delegate that the user did select a link to an address.
  • – attributedLabel:didSelectLinkWithPhoneNumber:

    Tells the delegate that the user did select a link to a phone number.
  • – attributedLabel:didSelectLinkWithDate:

    Tells the delegate that the user did select a link to a date.
  • – attributedLabel:didSelectLinkWithDate:timeZone:duration:

    Tells the delegate that the user did select a link to a date with a time zone and duration.
  • – attributedLabel:didSelectLinkWithTextCheckingResult:

    Tells the delegate that the user did select a link to a text checking result.

Instance Methods

attributedLabel:didSelectLinkWithAddress:

Tells the delegate that the user did select a link to an address.

- (void)attributedLabel:(BITAttributedLabel *)label didSelectLinkWithAddress:(NSDictionary *)addressComponents

Parameters

label

The label whose link was selected.

addressComponents

The components of the address for the selected link.

Parameters

The label whose link was selected.

attributedLabel:didSelectLinkWithDate:timeZone:duration:

Tells the delegate that the user did select a link to a date with a time zone and duration.

- (void)attributedLabel:(BITAttributedLabel *)label didSelectLinkWithDate:(NSDate *)date timeZone:(NSTimeZone *)timeZone duration:(NSTimeInterval)duration

Parameters

label

The label whose link was selected.

date

The date for the selected link.

timeZone

The time zone of the date for the selected link.

duration

The duration, in seconds from the date for the selected link.

Declared In

BITAttributedLabel.h

- (void)attributedLabel:(BITAttributedLabel *)label didSelectLinkWithPhoneNumber:(NSString *)phoneNumber

Parameters

label

The label whose link was selected.

phoneNumber

The phone number for the selected link.

Declared In

BITAttributedLabel.h

attributedLabel:didSelectLinkWithTextCheckingResult:

Tells the delegate that the user did select a link to a text checking result.

- (void)attributedLabel:(BITAttributedLabel *)label didSelectLinkWithTextCheckingResult:(NSTextCheckingResult *)result

Parameters

label

The label whose link was selected.

result

The custom text checking result.

Discussion

This method is called if no other delegate method was called, which can occur by either now implementing the method in TTTAttributedLabelDelegate corresponding to a particular link, or the link was added by passing an instance of a custom NSTextCheckingResult subclass into -addLinkWithTextCheckingResult:.

Declared In

BITAttributedLabel.h

- (void)attributedLabel:(BITAttributedLabel *)label didSelectLinkWithURL:(NSURL *)url

The label whose link was selected.

url
